name: Scourge (Team 3 - Studio McGhibli)
description:
The game (github)

Scourge is a choose-your-own-adventure-game starring a chonky bear boi who attempts to make his way through an unfamiliar world. How he came to be in this world is a mystery. Making his way through seemingly normal scenery, he may need to atone for what he has done in the past, or at least what was done to him in the past. This mysterious story reveals itself through the player's decisions, leading to multiple endings. Unveil all endings to see where the story leads you.

(This is our very first game jam!)

Credits:
